text: One Crimson Night is a two-disc live album and DVD by Swedish power metal band HammerFall. The album was recorded during a concert at Lisebergshallen, Sweden. The DVD with the live video was released on June 29, 2004. ==Track listing== ===DVD=== #"Lore of the Arcane" #"Riders of the Storm" #"Heeding the Call" #"Stone Cold" #"Hero's Return" #"Legacy of Kings" #"Bass Solo: Magnus Rosén" #"At the End of the Rainbow" #"The Way of the Warrior" #"The Unforgiving Blade" #"Glory to the Brave" #"Guitar Solo: Stefan Elmgren" #"Let the Hammer Fall" #"Renegade" #"Steel Meets Steel" #"Crimson Thunder" #"Templars of Steel" #"Gold Album Award" #"Hearts On Fire" #"HammerFall" ===Disc one=== #"Lore of the Arcane" #"Riders of the Storm" #"Heeding The Call" #"Stone Cold" #"Hero's Return" #"Legacy of Kings" #"Bass Solo: Magnus Rosén" #"At the End of the Rainbow" #"The Way of the Warrior" #"The Unforgiving Blade" #"Glory to the Brave" #"Guitar Solo: Stefan Elmgren" #"Let the Hammer Fall" ===Disc two=== #"Renegade" #"Steel Meets Steel" #"Crimson Thunder" #"Templars of Steel" #"Hearts On Fire" #"HammerFall" #"The Dragon Lies Bleeding" (Bonus Track) #"Stronger Than All" (Bonus Track) #"A Legend Reborn" (Bonus Track) ==Personnel== * Joacim Cans - Lead Vocals * Oscar Dronjak - Guitars, Backing Vocals * Stefan Elmgren - Guitars, Backing Vocals * Magnus Rosén - Bass Guitar * Anders Johansson - Drums Category:HammerFall albums Category:Power metal Category:2003 albums
